## ItemManager.fetch() method

Fetch an item by its 4-digit ID. The ID must be a string of 4 digits (not a number)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(key: string, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<Item>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | The ID of the item to fetch. |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetching options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Item](./shieldbow.item.md)<!-- -->&gt;
